Sentencas: The present study reports the effect of a dopant (gadolinium, Gd) on the grain size, generation of oxygen vacancies, and conductivity in ceria.
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route

Sentencas: Undoped and doped ceria (Ce1-xGdxO2-delta, x = 0, 0.10, 0.20, and 0.30) are synthesized by the ultrasound-assisted sol-gel combustion method, followed by sintering at 1450 degrees C for 4 h. X-ray diffraction studies confirm the formation of the cubic fluorite phase.
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route

Sentencas: The lattice parameter variation confirms that the solid solubility limit of present samples lies between x = 0.20 and x = 0.30.
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route

Sentencas: The crystallite size of the powders ranges between 5 and 30 nm.
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route

Sentencas: The morphology of sintered materials is studied using scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route

Sentencas: Raman spectroscopy is used to investigate the presence of different structural defects and oxygen vacancies in undoped and Gd-doped ceria (CeO2) samples.
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route

Sentencas: It also helped to detect the secondary phase formed in the GDC-30 sample.
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route

Sentencas: Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta with a uniform, dense morphology and the presence of oxygen vacancies has the highest electrical conductivity (1.67 x 10-2 S cm-1 at 600 degrees C).
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route

Sentencas: It could be a suitable material for electrolytes in solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effect of Intrinsic and Extrinsic Oxygen Vacancies on the Conductivity of Gd-Doped CeO2 Synthesized by a Sonochemical Route
